saao/saa05/P334093
a-na {LU₂}IGI.DUB be-li₂-ia₂ ARAD-ka {1}aš-šur-re-ṣu-u-a lu DI-mu a-na be-li₂-ia₂ ina UGU ERIM-MEŠ ša ina {URU}ku-um-me ša be-li₂ iš-pur-an-ni am-mu-te u₂-se-li am-mu-te u₂-di-na la u₂-ša-lak {1}a-ri-e {1}a-ri-za-a o a-nu-su-nu tar-ṣa-at u₂-di-na la u₂-na-maš-u₂-ni o ki-ma u₂-na-maš-u₂-ni o {LU₂}A-KIN-ia₂ {LU₂}A-KIN-ia₂ ina pa-na-at-u-šu₂-nu i-lak ina UGU-hi-ia i-sa-hu-ra be-li₂ u₂-da UD-MEŠ x x x x x x da x x x x i-di-in x x x x x x GURUN.BURU₁₄ e-ta-ṣi-di šum₂-mu be-li₂ u₂-ma-x x pa-ṭi-ra-a-te u₂-x x x be-li₂ liš-pur {LU₂}i-tu-ʾa-a.a ša {URU}BAD₃-{d}UTU o ša {URU}bar-za-ni-iš-ta le-lu-ni ERIM-MEŠ an-nu-te li-ip-ṭu-ur-u-ni ša be-li₂ iš-pur-an-ni ma-a 50 {LU₂}i-tu-ʾa-a.a ina {URU}15-BAD₃-a-ni lu-x x x x-ṣi {LU₂}u₂-x x x x x x+x ina IGI {1}DI-EN-la-aš₂-me be-li₂ lu-x+x x x
